message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to detect propaganda in news articles. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a novel multi-granularity neural network, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The evaluation measure proposed in the paper involves precision, recall, and F1-score, which are commonly used in machine learning and falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques to detect propaganda fragments, which falls under the category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper uses neural networks to perform the task, which falls under the category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
